# Web SDK Examples: Redaction

> These are interactive Nutrient Playground examples. Click any link to try the code in your browser.
> 
> For local runnable examples, see [web/annotation/README.md](../web/annotation/README.md).

---

## Redaction

- [Redact keywords programmatically](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%253D)
  - Load a PDF, search for keywords, create redaction annotations over the found text, and apply the redactions to permanently remove the text. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eGfnOXXTjWo)
  
- [Apply redactions to text with an overlay](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%%)
  - Load a PDF, retrieve all text lines from every page, create redaction annotations over the detected text using an overlay, and apply the redactions to the document. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IIciwmN-LZ4)

- [Approve or reject redactions before applying](https://github.com/PSPDFKit/awesome-pspdfkit/tree/master/web/annotation/redact-one-by-one)

- [Approve or reject redactions before applying — Playground](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%252BIHtcbiAgICAgICAgICAgIC8vIEdldCBhbGwgcmVkYWN0aW9uIGFubm90YXRpb25zIGV4Y2VwdCB0aGUgY3VycmVudCBvbmVcbiAgICAgICAgICAgIGNvbnN0IGFsbFJlZGFjdGlvbkFubm90YXRpb25zID0gKGF3YWl0IGdldEFsbEFubm90YXRpb25zKCkpLmZpbHRlcihcbiAgICAgICAgICAgICAgKGEpID0%%%253D%253D)
  - Manage redaction annotations from an annotation tooltip with two options that allow you to apply or reject redactions one by one. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1vAsjBmU1FA)
  
- [Add a custom tooltip to a redaction annotation](https://www.nutrient.io/playground?%253D%253D)
  - Add redaction tools to the toolbar and modify the tooltip behavior for redaction annotations. — [Video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b1pMsyNb8y8)
